oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bobby Bare phone interview - 1975-01-24
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Phone interview with Bobby Bare (performer) conducted by Joe Suglia, with an unidentified radio station in Kalamazoo, Michigan.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Magnavox television set commercial (incomplete) -- Arby's commercial -- weather report ([Unidentified]) -- Joe Suglia introduces Bobby Bare -- Bare talks about this being his first time in Kalamazoo with Tom T. Hall and Jeannie C. Riley -- Bare talks about taking December off and talks about his family album -- Bare talks about touring with family -- Bare talks about setting up for the nights show and other future shows -- Bare talks about premiering the a new record at the nights show -- Bare talks about recording Detroit City -- Bare talks about his new album the Hard Time Hungrys -- Joe thanks Bobby and signs off -- Detroit City (Bobby Bare) (incomplete recording)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bare, Bobby; Riley, Jeannie C.; Hall, Tom T.;
